title: Extreme wingsuit flying
description: Wingsuit jumping is the leading edge of extreme sports -- an exhilarating feat of almost unbelievable daring, where skydivers soar through canyons at over 100MPH. Ueli Gegenschatz talks about how (and why) he does it, and shows jawdropping film.
author: Ueli Gegenschatz
keywords: TED, talks, adventure, design, entertainment, exploration, extreme sports, flight, invention, sports, technology
